articles.title: Japanese startup creates 'connected' face mask for coronavirus new normal - Reuters India
articles.description: As face coverings become the norm amid the coronavirus pandemic, Japanese startup Donut Robotics has developed an internet-connected "smart mask" that can transmit messages and translate from Japanese into eight other languages.

articles.title: Realme X3 SuperZoom First Impressions - Gadgets 360
articles.description: The Realme X3 SuperZoom offers an impressive mix of features such as a powerful processor, fast charging, and a periscope-style camera — all at a pretty aggressive price. We spent some time with the new phone, and here are our first impressions.
